metadata.Title: CVE-2023-21123 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In multiple functions of multiple files, there is a possible way to bypassthe DISALLOW_DEBUGGING_FEATURES restriction for tracing due to a missingpermission check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-11 Android-12 Android-12LAndroid-13Android ID: A-270050064

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
